##### FILE: hostPath_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/nginx-pod1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  labels:
    app: nginx
  name: nginx-pod1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.cloudyuga.guru/library/nginx
    name: nginx-container
    ports:
    - containerPort: 80
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html/
      name: test-volume
  volumes:
  - hostPath:
      path: /data
      type: Directory
    name: test-volume

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Pod/nginx-pod1
policy disallow-default-namespace -> resource default/Pod/nginx-pod1 failed:
1 - validate-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed. rule validate-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource default/Pod/nginx-pod1 failed:
1 - require-image-tag validation failure: validation error: An image tag is required. rule require-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Pod/nginx-pod1 failed:
1 - require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Pod/nginx-pod1 failed:
1 - require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource default/Pod/nginx-pod1 failed:
1 - check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule check-for-labels failed at path /metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

policy require-requests-limits -> resource default/Pod/nginx-pod1 failed:
1 - validate-resources validation error: CPU and memory resource requests and memory limits are required for containers. rule validate-resources failed at path /spec/containers/0/resources/

policy require-pod-probes -> resource default/Pod/nginx-pod1 failed:
1 - validate-probes validation failure: Liveness, readiness, or startup probes are required for all containers.

1 - validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem validation error: Root filesystem must be read-only. rule validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem failed at path /spec/containers/0/securityContext/

1 - validate-registries validation error: Unknown image registry. rule validate-registries failed at path /spec/containers/0/image/

  name: nginx-pod2

    name: nginx-container2

      name: test-volume
      subPath: hello.html
  volumes:
  - hostPath:
      path: /data
      type: Directory
    name: test-volume

##### FILE: hostPath_21.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/test-webserver:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: test-webserver
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/test-webserver:latest
    name: test-webserver
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /var/local/aaa
      name: mydir
    - mountPath: /var/local/aaa/1.txt
      name: myfile
  volumes:
  - hostPath:
      path: /var/local/aaa
      type: DirectoryOrCreate
    name: mydir
  - hostPath:
      path: /var/local/aaa/1.txt
      type: FileOrCreate
    name: myfile

---

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Pod/test-webserver failed:

policy require-requests-limits -> resource default/Pod/test-webserver failed:
1 - validate-resources validation error: CPU and memory resource requests and memory limits are required for containers. rule validate-resources failed at path /spec/containers/0/resources/

policy require-pod-probes -> resource default/Pod/test-webserver failed:

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/Pod/kube-apiserver:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: kube-apiserver
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  containers:
  - command:
    - kube-apiserver <content-hidden>
    image: k8s.gcr.io/kube-apiserver-amd64:v1.11.3
    name: kube-apiserver
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /tmp/users
      name: usr-details
      readOnly: true
  volumes:
  - hostPath:
      path: /tmp/users
      type: DirectoryOrCreate
    name: usr-details

---

##### FILE: hostpath_deploy.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mongo-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo-app
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: mongo-app
      name: mongo-pod
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --dbpath
        - /data/db
        env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          value: admin
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: password
        image: mongo
        name: mongo-container
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongo-volume
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /mydata
        name: mongo-volume

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/mongo-deployment
policy disallow-default-namespace -> resource default/Deployment/mongo-deployment failed:
1 - validate-podcontroller-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed for pod controllers. rule validate-podcontroller-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource default/Deployment/mongo-deployment failed:
1 - autogen-require-image-tag validation failure: validation error: An image tag is required. rule autogen-require-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Deployment/mongo-deployment failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Deployment/mongo-deployment failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource default/Deployment/mongo-deployment failed:
1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

policy require-requests-limits -> resource default/Deployment/mongo-deployment failed:
1 - autogen-validate-resources validation error: CPU and memory resource requests and memory limits are required for containers. rule autogen-validate-resources failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/resources/

policy require-pod-probes -> resource default/Deployment/mongo-deployment failed:
1 - autogen-validate-probes validation failure: Liveness, readiness, or startup probes are required for all containers.

policy require-ro-rootfs -> resource default/Deployment/mongo-deployment failed:
1 - autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem validation error: Root filesystem must be read-only. rule autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/securityContext/

    port: 80
    protocol: TCP
    targetPort: 8080

  type: NodePort

kind: Pod
metadata:

    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes1
  namespace: default

  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

      type: RuntimeDefault
  volumes:
  - hostPath:
      path: /a
    name: volume-hostpath-a
  - hostPath:
      path: /b
    name: volume-hostpath-b

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault
  volumes:
  - hostPath:
      path: /a
    name: volume-hostpath-a
  - hostPath:
      path: /b
    name: volume-hostpath-b

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

1 - validate-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed. rule validate-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource default/Pod/hostpathvolumes1 failed:
1 - require-image-tag validation failure: validation error: An image tag is required. rule require-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Pod/hostpathvolumes1 failed:
1 - require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Pod/hostpathvolumes1 failed:
1 - require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

1 - check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule check-for-labels failed at path /metadata/labels/

##### FILE: hostpathvolumes1664.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostpathvolumes1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault
  volumes:
  - hostPath:
      path: /a
    name: volume-hostpath-a
  - hostPath:
      path: /b
    name: volume-hostpath-b

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostpathvolumes1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
  volumes:
  - hostPath:
      path: /a
    name: volume-hostpath-a
  - hostPath:
      path: /b
    name: volume-hostpath-b

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostpathvolumes1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
  volumes:
  - hostPath:
      path: /a
    name: volume-hostpath-a
  - hostPath:
      path: /b
    name: volume-hostpath-b

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

        drop:
        - ALL

        - ALL

  - hostPath:

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostpathvolumes1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
  volumes:
  - hostPath:
      path: /a
    name: volume-hostpath-a
  - hostPath:
      path: /b
    name: volume-hostpath-b

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostpathvolumes1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
  volumes:
  - hostPath:
      path: /a
    name: volume-hostpath-a
  - hostPath:
      path: /b
    name: volume-hostpath-b

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Pod/hostpathvolumes1
policy disallow-default-namespace -> resource default/Pod/hostpathvolumes1 failed:
1 - validate-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed. rule validate-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource default/Pod/hostpathvolumes1 failed:
1 - require-image-tag validation failure: validation error: An image tag is required. rule require-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Pod/hostpathvolumes1 failed:
1 - require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Pod/hostpathvolumes1 failed:
1 - require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource default/Pod/hostpathvolumes1 failed:
1 - check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule check-for-labels failed at path /metadata/labels/

policy require-requests-limits -> resource default/Pod/hostpathvolumes1 failed:
1 - validate-resources validation error: CPU and memory resource requests and memory limits are required for containers. rule validate-resources failed at path /spec/initContainers/0/resources/

policy require-pod-probes -> resource default/Pod/hostpathvolumes1 failed:
1 - validate-probes validation failure: Liveness, readiness, or startup probes are required for all containers.

policy require-ro-rootfs -> resource default/Pod/hostpathvolumes1 failed:
1 - validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem validation error: Root filesystem must be read-only. rule validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem failed at path /spec/containers/0/securityContext/readOnlyRootFilesystem/

1 - validate-registries validation error: Unknown image registry. rule validate-registries failed at path /spec/initContainers/0/image/

  - hostPath:

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostpathvolumes1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault
  volumes:
  - hostPath:
      path: /a
    name: volume-hostpath-a
  - hostPath:
      path: /b
    name: volume-hostpath-b

##### FILE: hostpathvolumes1790.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostpathvolumes1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
  volumes:
  - hostPath:
      path: /a
    name: volume-hostpath-a
  - hostPath:
      path: /b
    name: volume-hostpath-b

---

##### FILE: hostpathvolumes1844.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostpathvolumes1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault
  volumes:
  - hostPath:
      path: /a
    name: volume-hostpath-a
  - hostPath:
      path: /b
    name: volume-hostpath-b

---


Mutation:

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostpathvolumes1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
  volumes:
  - hostPath:
      path: /a
    name: volume-hostpath-a
  - hostPath:
      path: /b
    name: volume-hostpath-b

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Pod/hostpathvolumes1
policy disallow-default-namespace -> resource default/Pod/hostpathvolumes1 failed:
1 - validate-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed. rule validate-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource default/Pod/hostpathvolumes1 failed:
1 - require-image-tag validation failure: validation error: An image tag is required. rule require-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Pod/hostpathvolumes1 failed:
1 - require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Pod/hostpathvolumes1 failed:
1 - require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource default/Pod/hostpathvolumes1 failed:
1 - check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule check-for-labels failed at path /metadata/labels/

policy require-requests-limits -> resource default/Pod/hostpathvolumes1 failed:
1 - validate-resources validation error: CPU and memory resource requests and memory limits are required for containers. rule validate-resources failed at path /spec/initContainers/0/resources/

policy require-pod-probes -> resource default/Pod/hostpathvolumes1 failed:
1 - validate-probes validation failure: Liveness, readiness, or startup probes are required for all containers.

policy require-ro-rootfs -> resource default/Pod/hostpathvolumes1 failed:
1 - validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem validation error: Root filesystem must be read-only. rule validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem failed at path /spec/containers/0/securityContext/

policy restrict-image-registries -> resource default/Pod/hostpathvolumes1 failed:
1 - validate-registries validation error: Unknown image registry. rule validate-registries failed at path /spec/initContainers/0/image/


pass: 7, fail: 9, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 1

    name: volume-hostpath-a
  - hostPath:

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostpathvolumes1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
  volumes:
  - hostPath:
      path: /a
    name: volume-hostpath-a
  - hostPath:
      path: /b
    name: volume-hostpath-b

---

##### FILE: hostpathvolumes1899.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostpathvolumes1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault
  volumes:
  - hostPath:
      path: /a
    name: volume-hostpath-a
  - hostPath:
      path: /b
    name: volume-hostpath-b

---


Mutation:

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes1
  namespace: default

  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  initContainers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

    runAsNonRoot: true

    name: volume-hostpath-a
  - hostPath:
      path: /b
    name: volume-hostpath-b

      type: RuntimeDefault

  - hostPath:

##### FILE: hostpid-exec-deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/hostpid-exec-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: pentest
    type: deployment
  name: hostpid-exec-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: pentest
      type: deployment
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: pentest
        type: deployment
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - while true; do sleep 30; done;
        command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        - --
        image: ubuntu
        name: hostpid-exec-deployment
      hostPID: true

---

##### FILE: hostport-1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to test/Pod/hostport-1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: hostport-1
  namespace: test
spec:
  containers:
  - image: nginx:1.14.2
    name: nginx
    ports:
    - containerPort: 80
      hostPort: 8081
    readinessProbe:
      httpGet:
        path: /
        port: 80
      initialDelaySeconds: 30
      periodSeconds: 20
  restartPolicy: Never

---


Mutation:

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostports0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: hostports0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    ports:
    - containerPort: 12345
      hostPort: 12345
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

##### FILE: hostports0101.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostports0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: hostports0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    ports:
    - containerPort: 12345
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    ports:
    - containerPort: 12346
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

---

##### FILE: hostports0102.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostports0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: hostports0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    ports:
    - containerPort: 12345
      hostPort: 12345
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

---

##### FILE: hostports0103.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostports0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: hostports0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    ports:
    - containerPort: 12345
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    ports:
    - containerPort: 12346
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostports0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: hostports0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    ports:
    - containerPort: 12345
      hostPort: 12345
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

##### FILE: hostports0105.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostports0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: hostports0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    ports:
    - containerPort: 12345
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    ports:
    - containerPort: 12346
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostports0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: hostports0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    ports:
    - containerPort: 12345
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    ports:
    - containerPort: 12346
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

---

kind: Pod

  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    ports:
    - containerPort: 12345
      hostPort: 12345

      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: hostports0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    ports:
    - containerPort: 12345
      hostPort: 12345
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostports0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: hostports0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    ports:
    - containerPort: 12345
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    ports:
    - containerPort: 12346
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

kind: Pod

    ports:
    - containerPort: 12345
      hostPort: 12345

    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

  name: hostports0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:

##### FILE: hostports01323.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostports0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: hostports0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    ports:
    - containerPort: 12345
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    ports:
    - containerPort: 12346
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostports0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: hostports0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    ports:
    - containerPort: 12345
      hostPort: 12345
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource default/Pod/hostports0 failed:
1 - require-image-tag validation failure: validation error: An image tag is required. rule require-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Pod/hostports0 failed:
1 - require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Pod/hostports0 failed:
1 - require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

1 - check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule check-for-labels failed at path /metadata/labels/

policy require-requests-limits -> resource default/Pod/hostports0 failed:
1 - validate-resources validation error: CPU and memory resource requests and memory limits are required for containers. rule validate-resources failed at path /spec/initContainers/0/resources/

1 - validate-probes validation failure: Liveness, readiness, or startup probes are required for all containers.
